scripts.build:storybook-static: if [ "$NODE_ENV" = "production" ] && [ -z "$npm_config_skip_storybook" ]; then npm run storybook:build-static; fi
scripts.scss: node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path libraries --importer node_modules/node-sass-magic-importer/dist/cli.js --source-map true --output dist components
scripts.watch: npm run build && run-p storybook:start watch:**
scripts.watch:icons: onchange -k './src/icons/**/*.svg' -- onerror "run-s icons" --title "There was an icons-related error"
scripts.watch:js: onchange -k './components/**/*.js' -e './components/**/*.story.js' -- onerror "run-s build:js" --title "There was a JS formatting or syntax error"
scripts.watch:scss: onchange -k './components/**/*.scss' -- onerror "run-s build:css" --title "There was a CSS/SCSS/Postcss error"
scripts.watch:stories: onchange -k './components/**/*.story.js' './tokens/*.story.mdx' -- onerror "run-s build:css" --title "There was a CSS/SCSS/Postcss error"
scripts.watch:tailwind: onchange -k './tailwind.config.js' -- onerror "npm run-s build:css" --title "There was a CSS/SCSS/Postcss error"
scripts.watch:tailwind-typography: onchange -k './components/01-atoms/rich-text/tailwind-typography-config.js' -- onerror "npm run-s postcss" --title "There was a Postcss error"
